message:
I had an interview and was asked to make a [ SPA for REST api ]

I know the REST but what is SPA ??

data.message: The short answer would be "Angular Angular Angular" and then you set down and put  your on glasses and you'll hear this sound " Yeah"

Thnx guys

Muhammad Negm do you suggest Angular.js rather than PHP , AJAX ?

Angular you use it instead of Ajax and helpful for manage directive and it has a built in templating system. however you will need a programing language for the backend can be php, ruby, node, anything depends on your skills and what do you prefer.
